short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple QR Code Generator (Generator and Reader). You can convert your browser into a full featured qr code reader app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A powerful and simple QR code generator that helps you to easily generate and scan QR codes.

A Simple QR Code Generator (Generator and Reader). You can convert your browser into a full featured qr code reader app

This amazing plugin provides seamless integration of a QR code generator and scanner. Simply convert the current webpage, text, or link into a QR code, and then scan QR codes immediately from the webpage.

Features:

* Create QR codes for your current webpage.
* QR codes on the website can be conveniently scanned with a right click.
* Create QR codes for any input (text, link, or website).
* Create QR codes from any text on active tab
* Create QR codes from any link on active tab
* Create QR codes from active tab url
* Download QR codes as pictures.
* Decode or Read any QR code from your edge
* Free forever.
